go_data.justification: LTBP-1 is associated with the extracellular matrix via the targeting mechanism involving LTBP-1 of the large latent TGFbeta1 complex.
LTBP-1 contains structural motifs involved in protein-protein interaction, and is thought to target the large latent TGFbeta complex on the surface of certain cells.
LTBP-1 is a latent TGFbeta-binding protein that binds to TGF-beta.
LTBP-1 is involved in the formation of extracellular microfibrils and is associated with the microfibrillar component of elastic fibers.
